      • createOfferAndReturnID

        public long createOfferAndReturnID​(api.model.Offer expectedOffer)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an offer using the passed offer object and returns its offer ID

        The function sends a POST request to the API to create an offer The API then sends back the Offer ID (which is generated in the API)

        Parameters:
        expectedOffer - is the offer to be created by the API
        Returns:
        the Offer ID created by the API
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - from json conversion

      • retrieveAndValidateOffer

        public void retrieveAndValidateOffer​(api.model.Offer expectedOffer)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves and validate an offer against the passed expectedOffer

        The function sends a GET request to the API to retrieve the expectedOffers' ID The API then sends the requested Offer back The function then validates the content of the response against the passed expectedOffer

        Parameters:
        expectedOffer - is the offer to be created by the API
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - from json conversion

      • cancelOffer

        public void cancelOffer​(long offerID)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Cancels the offer specified in offerID passed parameter

        The function sends a PUT request to the API to cancel the offer

        Parameters:
        offerID - defines the offer ID of the offer to be cancelled by the API
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - from json conversion
